original_text: And ye shall take no satisfaction for him that is fled to the city of his refuge, that he should come again to dwell in the land, until the death of the priest.
korean_text: 또 도피성에 피한 자는 대제사장이 죽기 전에는 속전을 받고 그의 땅으로 돌아가 거주하게 하지 말 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall take no satisfaction for him
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그를 위해 어떤 대가도 받지 말라

sentences.original_text: that is fled to the city of his refuge
until the death of the priest
